data.name: SCP: EVENT CLASSIFIED
data.detailed_description:
DISCORD CHANNEL!

Join our discord and follow the latest updates and demo tests!


About the Game

EVENT CLASSIFIED is a unique horror shooter that allows players to take on a role of a soldier, prisoner, scientist and even monster. Fight other players or unite with them to survive in this mysterious facility.

Every role has its unique objectives which will inevitably intersect with the objectives of others. It is entirely up to the players whether they cooperate or compete.

Irrespectively of the interactions you had with other people, you will always be haunted by hostile anomalies that is controlled by both the players and the AI.

UNIQUE FEATURES

  • ABSOLUTELY NEW AND ORIGINAL CONTENT
    We have put in extra effort into not using cookie-cutter tier SCP subjects, so the ones you will meet in EVENT CLASSIFIED will not be anything like those that you met in other games within the SCP universe.

  • TOTAL REPLAYABILITY
    Not only is the map reshuffled every round, but so are the items, anomalies, level of compound’s contamination, and even the relationships between the roles.

  • MODERATELY HARSH REALISM
    Reloading with magazines instead of bullets, a pain scale instead of simple hp numbers, a helmet and a bulletproof vest instead of an armor counter, and other interesting and realistic details. Survival is not going to be so easy. However, properly selected items and tactics will give you the opportunity to get through any obstacles on your way.

  • MONSTERS ARE NOT THE ONLY THREAT
    No one wants to be dead, and an traitor can hide behind every corner. Just like you, other players are ready to do anything to survive. Keep your allies close and potential traitors even closer.

  • A MULTITUDE OF GAME MODES
    Game has various game modes that allow you to see the facility from a variety of angels, times and situations. Want to jump into the action without any SCPs at all? Or maybe with more SCPs and less people? Say no more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are the lowest requirements, for a comfortable game, it is necessary to meet the recommended

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5930K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080ti / AMD R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
